meanings.definition: A type of insect known for emitting a foul odor when threatened.
meanings.sent1: Stinkbugs can release a bad smell to protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: I saw stinkbugs in the garden yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The stinkbugs decided to have a smelly party in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The stinkbugs' odor was like a warning signal to other insects.
meanings.sent5: The children learned to identify stinkbugs by their stinky defense mechanism.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the stinkbugs on that tree!
meanings.sent2: The stinkbugs were crawling on the windowsill.
meanings.sent3: The stinkbugs gathered for a meeting on the leaf.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with stinkbugs, creating a pungent atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The farmer sprayed the stinkbugs with water to move them away from the crops.
